website_summaries.verdict: A good purchase when you are looking for a simple way to carry extra formula on-the-go without taking up too much space.
pros: The main dispensing container uses three separate chambers for multiple refills
Each chamber dispenses enough formula for a standard 8 oz
cons: Central divider leaves space between the three chambers, allowing powder and liquid to leak

customer_reviews.title: So good I'm going to buy another
customer_reviews.text: We've had this a day and already love it. Our newborn eats a lot and we are currently supplementing with formula. So now at 3am I don't have to walk to the kitchen and mix a bottle, I simply grab the pre-water filled bottle from my nightstand and mix in one section of powder from this dispenser. It's very easy to fill and to empty, easy to clean and colorful. Price point is good and you also get a single serve dispenser too. Once we start venturing out more this will have its place in the diaper bag, I will probably need to buy a second dispenser!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is a convenient container perfect for carrying individual servings of formula in the diaper bag. My only caution would be to make sure that the lid is positioned correctly or else when you pour out the formula you will get formula from the compartment next to it as well. I learned that the hard way the very first time I used it. But that is a user error and has nothing to do with the product. It's pretty cheap and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the best things I've ever purchased. I remember my sister quite a few years ago had these types with my niece and nephew. When I found them for my babe I instantly bought it. So incredibly helpful with the easy pour container, I tried to do just a little square container before these and I got formula powder everywhere. They are small too so they don't take up too much room in the diaper bag. Just get em. They are insanely handy for trips and travelling or just going to appts.
customer_reviews.author: Car710

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: It works better than I expected! The compartments don't seem to intermingle, and it is easy to get it in the bottle. What they should have done though, was put labels in with it so you can measure out how much you need. For example, I don't necessarily need formula for an 8 oz bottle every time, but would like one for 4. I ended up measuring out the scoops and writing on it with a sharpie. Other than that, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: l

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby formula but also for powdered collagen
customer_reviews.text: Are use this to hold my powdered collagen to make it easier for me to use it every morning instead of scooping into the bag and it works like a charm. I remember these from when my kids were young and I use them with powdered formula, also a lifesaver. I’ve told friends about it as a cool way to bring your pre-work out with you etc.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Road!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these formula dispensers because we were traveling to India with my son for the first time (he was 10 months old at the time). We were going to be attending a wedding and doing some shopping so we were going to out of the house a lot. We wanted a dispense as we did not want to have to carry the big formula bottle everywhere. These two dispensers were perfect!! We took them everywhere and they did not spill once. It is easy to twist and empty into the baby bottles! A great product for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Amit Patel

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel or premixing daily formula powder
customer_reviews.text: I own multiple dispensers because I love them! They are perfect for travel and to transport to daycare. I premeasure formula + oatmeal and keep the portions in these containers for easy bottle making throughout the day. Cleaning the containers is simple either by tossing them in the dishwasher or by hand and then letting them air dry. I purchased this brand because I wanted the single dispenser; the color I received was pink with a green top. While the set does the job, I prefer the Dr. Brown dispenser because of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Glam Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Best formula containers
customer_reviews.text: This set is a life saver! Hands down my favorite formula container! I had the individual ones that fit in a certain bottle and those were amazing as well but I kept losing the pieces. with the main one in this pack it's only 2 parts but it holds enough for 3- 8oz bottles. The single one is good for on the go. When the baby gets old enough to have snacks you can use it for that also
customer_reviews.author: Katie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Honest mom review
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product I am not sure if I just got a defective one but it made all my formula move from one side to another so it really didn’t help me. And made me frustrated not knowing how much formula I was giving my child. Please be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Cone135

customer_reviews.title: Do not put it in Baby Brezza Sanitizer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few days ago I didn't even get to use it, I wanted to sanitize it before use idk if I missed any labels that says do not sanitize in Sterilizer!? But do not put it in Baby Brezza Sanitizer or any sanitizer for that matter. The lid not longer fits and falls out when flip, the container itself shrunk therefore I had to toss it since we can't use it anymore 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Marialuisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for late night feeds!
customer_reviews.text: This container makes formula bottles SO easy. My baby is mostly feed breast milk, but we put the solo dry formula in her baby bag to always have available for a serving size. Also, in the middle of the night often we give her a formula bottle. It’s so easy to have the water already in the bottle and just dump in a serving of formula to feed her and head back to bed. Dispensing and filling is a little difficult at times. The lid is so strong, making it that no formula falls out, but that makes it a little difficult to open to refill. Overall would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ARomo

customer_reviews.title: Part of the plastic inside the container has broken on two different dispensers.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these dispensers a few months ago. I love them but recently noticed that on one of the dividers inside the container a piece of the plastic (where the divider meets the outside of the container) had broken off. I threw it out and ordered a replacement about a week ago. I now noticed that on the other dispenser I originally ordered the same thing is happening. The plastic is cracked but hasn’t completely broken off yet. This is so dangerous because if you didn’t notice it, it could get mixed into the baby’s formula and end up in the bottle. Originally loved the dispenser but this hazard is extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 more
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a try because frankly, if it was garbage, it was under $4 garbage. Thankfully that’s not the case. I love having the separate single dispenser because most of the time my baby currently takes 4oz bottles, but takes 5oz at night or if he had a long nap. I use the 3-compartment for 4oz servings and the single for 5oz to prep both working from home and night feedings. Lid is very snug, but I consider that a good sign for sealed well. Pretty easy to get all the formula to empty through the pour spout.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Not For Us
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something we could easily fill, transport, and then pour from. It was easy to fill. Simple to transport but found that the compartments did not keep the portions separated. It was just ok for pouring formula from container to bottle without spillage --but still awkward. We are not longer using this. We did buy test tubes with screw tops which are Great ! easy to fill and transport and simple to pour into bottle without spillage.
customer_reviews.author: Grammas in NY

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Got this today and was super disappointed. The lid barely clicks in and pops right off if I attempt to pick it up by the lid. Storing formula in this will be a nightmare and I’m going to end up ordering another brand. Too cheap to go through the hassle of returning. I guess you get what you paid for. Edit: Tried storing 3 servings of formula in it in a small diaper bag. Container somehow got overturned and the lid came off, spilling all the formula in the bottom of the diaper bag. What a waste of expensive formula. This is definitely going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea this existed.. and my son is 9 months! Wish I had it sooner!! Super easy to make bottles on the go and super easy to clean. (It’s dishwasher safe.) The only thing is it can only hold 6 ounces worth of formula in each compartment, so I’m not sure what I’ll do once my son starts drinking more fluid ounces at a time. 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling and late night feeds
customer_reviews.text: Packing was different then the photo, but still great price and happy with the product. Perfect for traveling and late night feeds. I find it easier to fill without loosing formula.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, But Be Careful How You Pour.
customer_reviews.text: Love having this for making bottles on the go. However, make sure you have the opening lined up perfectly or you will end up pouring from more than one compartment. Tried making a bottle on the plane when lighting was minimal and the formula poured from two compartments so it was a waste of what would’ve made two bottles, which was not good when we found out our checked luggage was lost which contained the rest of our daughter’s formula.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great combo pack!
customer_reviews.text: Love this combo pack! This is the only option I've found with a single portion, which is great to have for quick trips or walks around the block when I know we won't be gone long. We've tried several brands of formula dispenser - they all get the job done, but what I like about this one is the funnel shaped opening that makes emptying the formula into the bottle much easier! My only complaint is that you really have to line up the funnel in the center of each compartment, otherwise some formula from the one next to it will also empty into the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: firenze6Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great formula container that beats others!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dispenser...the tiny one serving cup is adorable and great to pack for just a quick excursion if you are trying to limit the supplies. But the best part: I registered for another OXO one but realized I needed another one for longer visits. I am glad I did because my mom went to feed her and the OXO one had somehow had allowed formula to mix with another compartment making the measurements very off. Another explanation is it clumped and made the compartments uneven, but EITHER way...this Munchkin one has not once made me second guess measurements. Also, the higher spout makes pouring the formula less messy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for night time feeding and on-the-go!
customer_reviews.text: There is no easier way to prepare formula for a night time feeding(s) or when you're on the go if you don't have this. I use them to pre-filled when I need to make a bottle at night for my baby or when we go to out to family or friends - or visit somewhere for the weekend - it makes it easy to pack your formula to go! The ease of use on these is awesome and they are super easy to clean! Highly recommended for any parent!
customer_reviews.author: GetFit NoExcuses

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and compact! Perfect for diaper bags!
customer_reviews.text: We were so tired of carrying around the big formula container and needed something more compact. It’s easy to use. Just measure out your desired powder amount into each compartment and put the lid back on. Word of advice though if you’re clumsy like me do that part over your formula container Incase of spillage. The lid stays on secure and we’ve had no accidents at all once we’ve put the lid on. This set also comes with a single compartment container too for quick trips. When they need cleaned I wash them right along with the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Trumbull

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We really love this brand of formula dispenser. We bought a couple random brands from walmart a while back and they were so difficult to use. These are so much easier. The formula comes out easily without having to bang it around 5 million times. Super happy with the price as well. Not crazy about not being able to choose the color combo, but who cares. My baby sure doesn't!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Works but not great
customer_reviews.text: A few times I have noticed that if the container isn’t upright the formula will mix from compartment to compartment so you are unaware of how much formula you are actually feeding your baby. But it does work if it stays upright. The top is getting kind of loose and I’m afraid it may fall off at some point which would be a disaster on the go. The individual container works great though and makes traveling easier
customer_reviews.author: Janellwright

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry dispenser
customer_reviews.text: It is very handy to take the formula to go. It has 3 compartments and you can fill up-to 4 scoops in each compartment that can make 8 oz of formula milk. with the bigger formula dispenser we can make up-to 24 oz milk and there a smaller formula dispenser which can accommodate another 4 scoops.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Sabir Aqueel

customer_reviews.title: Great treat dispenser for my cat Rocky
customer_reviews.text: I use this for treats for my aged cat. Rocky loves his treats and the large container is good for dispensing treats. I use the small container for traveling. There are no negative issues regarding turning to the different chambers. It has not accidentally opened. It works great for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Coy's mom

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and wish I would of purchased it sooner. It easily can fit 8oz worth of formula in each compartment and closes tight enough where there are no spills with the exception of the mini spills on the inside between compartments. I was originally skeptical because a few people mentioned spills on the inside and that it didn’t keep the formula devidedmbut these spill are very minor to the point that it’s the equivalent of a sprinkle of salt so nothing to worry about :). I love this and I’m glad I purchased this. No more carrying around my daughters big box of enfamil :P.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting. Good and
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this is the large dispenser with 3 compartments they aren’t fully closed off separate. If this tips or moves around in your traveling diaper bag the powdered formula will go into all the compartments leaving them all uneven of what you measured out. The single container however is perfect and great to have. Other than that I would’ve given more stars.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Maee

customer_reviews.title: Wish we had it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors, loved to product, easy to use. Actually was excited it was cheap and great quality! Saw the bad reviews but I guess they didn’t read that you can’t sterilize it that’s all. And you just twist until it locks into place and voila open the lid and dispenses perfectly portioned formula! I love it for travel, no mess! And love to use at night when it’s in the middle of the night and I’m exhausted and don’t want to measure the formula. Really is an amazing product and I only wished I had it since my baby was born!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Dube

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to Open-Defective?
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hard to open the 3 compartment container. The small 1 serving container is IMPOSSIBLE to open. It’s like the plastic pieces didn’t fit and were just jammed together. Seems like it would be useful if I could you know, use them. It may just be a defective item? The price was great and I haven’t had trouble with munchkin products before.
customer_reviews.author: Annazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's hard enough to have to haul formula everywhere but this little container is just perfect. We fill 2 sides with 6oz worth and another side with 4oz worth. That's enough to get us through the time we're out. I use Similac formula and I'm guessing I could fit enough for 10oz worth with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great for fitness supplements!
customer_reviews.text: I actually got these to store pre measured servings of pre-workout, BCAA, and protein, which I don’t remember seeing anyone else speaking to in the comments. It was perfect to toss in my gym bag and saved me lots of space from not carrying the bulky canisters !
customer_reviews.author: Tiara McClure

customer_reviews.title: Easy, on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean! Perfect for on the go and traveling. We just started having to supplement with formula and this makes it so much easier to take along for the day rather than a can or having to refrigerate premade.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Must have for formula
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I survived without this! I have 2 and other brands but this is by far the best! Formula comes out easy and doesn't blow away or need to be hit hard to come out. No more carrying a giant formula container!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel
customer_reviews.text: Got this to make it easier to travel with to put formula in for my baby. The cover is very hard to open and close. Also, it’s not too easy to clean especially the inside corners. Other than that, it’s a good idea to have this to bring out for a long day as it saves space in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: hoi yu

customer_reviews.title: Better than Dr. Browns Dispensers
customer_reviews.text: I love that this comes with an extra single dispenser! It works way better than the Dr. Browns version which has 3 compartments but no extra container. The powder doesn’t spill from compartment to compartment like the Dr. Browns does. Inexpensive and super useful. We use it for both formula and rice cereal.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Ligress

customer_reviews.title: Best dispenser on the market!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best formula dispensers! I love that you get a single use dispenser as well. Was a little annoyed that you can’t pick which color you get but now I wouldn’t care either way. They are that good
customer_reviews.author: Damion Babineaux

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This product makes formula feeding on the go effortless. Before I purchased this I would either mix bottles before leaving the house or scoop the desired amount or formula into a. Neither of those choices was ideal. Mixing bottles ahead of time meant they either needed to be chilled or consumed shortly after and the Medela bottles made it difficult to get all the formula into the bottles filled with water without getting powder everywhere. I especially love the smaller dispenser because it's great for shorter trips to the park or library and I can use the larger dispenser for snacks such as raisins and Cheerios for my toddler. This is one of the best purchases I made!
customer_reviews.author: SteF

customer_reviews.title: Great Container for Travel
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a vacation where we would be on an airplane, then car, then running around to different relatives. The containers worked great to help not tote along the huge formula container. The plastic is pretty thick and durable and washes up nicely. I've had them now for about two years, and they're still like new. After formula, I used them to put snacks in like cereal o's, puffs, etc. When my daughter got older, she loved to put in the O's in the little containers (inadvertent fine motor skills toy too!). Overall, I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep portions separate!
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be divided into sections so you can portion out amounts for bottles, but there is no divider at the top that keeps those sections separate. So there is no way to accurately make a bottle. I had to wrap the top in plastic wrap before putting the lid on to even attempt to separate the sections and they still didn't stay. This easily could lead to feeding your baby the wrong amounts of powder mixed with water which in some cases could results in an upset stomach and in others could even be dangerous. TERRIBLE product.
customer_reviews.author: blair b.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling with powdered formula and also for middle ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling with powdered formula and also for middle of the night feedings. We keep the bigger container in our diaper bag for when we are out running errands and we use the smaller one for early morning feedings. I wish we had these when our son was waking up multiple times a night to eat, the 3 compartment container would be perfect. Each compartment holds enough formula for an 8 ounce bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Hanks MamaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Decent Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser is good for the price but not for everyone. Living in South Florida it's very humid and the formula starts to moisten inside making it harder to dispense. Outside of that, it's very easy to pack into a diaper bag or even use bedside for late-night feeds.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Ball

customer_reviews.title: No spills
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because of the reviews saying it doesnt hold the formula in the compartments. But when i tried it, i didnt have any problems with spills of formula. I like how it is compact, saves space in my diaper bag. and can store up to three mix for milk. Will definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Team A

customer_reviews.title: Tough to open or turn. Little one is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this product. I can barely turn the lid of the triple compartment container. I can still use it, but I am looking into another one. The additional container, however, is absolutely perfect and zero complaints. The extra container is the reason I gave the product any stars. If anything I wish they sold the smaller container by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I chose the one where I didn’t get to pick the color. I received a pink and green one which wouldn’t be my first pick but I really don’t care. Price was great. I was able to use this while traveling from Maine to California and works out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great and a must if you are formula feeding
customer_reviews.text: These are super easy to dispense into bottles. I actually already had one and bought an extra for the diaper bag. I have the formula pre-measured for night feedings as well. Great price
customer_reviews.author: jgallardo13

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean , the one thing I will say sucks is that some of the formula gets stuck on the sides . But if you shake it out enough it will all come out into the bottle or whatever you are using to feed your baby . But I love it ! Would purchase again if needed
customer_reviews.author: Tiara Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Love these for traveling. It makes fixing a bottle in the car much easier. Only problem is sometimes it’s hard to open and sometimes the formula doesn’t come out super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I dont have to get out of bed at night. I keep a thermal of warm water, and the formula dispenser at my bedside. Easy to take traveling. It’s great. And the hole is big so it pours perfectly
customer_reviews.author: sylvia miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for formula on the go
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for formula on the go! Unlike some other ones, u can shake this one into the bottle and it only dispenses the formula from one slot (the other formula stays in the other parts of the container). My sister got one too and loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Easy to dispense. I like the mini size
customer_reviews.text: easy to dispense. Didn't have accidents in my diaper bags so far. I like having both sizes, i use the small one at night when I need to make a bottle quickly, or for short visits.
customer_reviews.author: Reut

customer_reviews.title: Well-worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are very inexpensive and came with a little bonus dispenser too. It is very easy to clean and use. I carry them everywhere with me and use them for protein powders.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Formula Fed or Supplemented Babies
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for moms feeding their babies formula! It makes it so easy to travel and use in a rush! We have one and got one for our in-laws who watch our baby girl once a week!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Anne

customer_reviews.title: Diaper bag essential-life saver
customer_reviews.text: We had some of these with our first kid and they are a life saver for the diaper bag! We have since moved into a two story home and have another kid so we bought another set so we can keep some upstairs so we don’t have to walk up and down the stairs while we are groggy for middle of the night feeding times. It’s made life way easier and makes those middle of the night feedings slightly more tolerable having things close and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly sure what makes this any better than 4-ounce Tupperware containers...
customer_reviews.text: We got ours super cheap, so I'm not too bummed about it. I couldn't imagine spending $9 or $10 on these, though. It's just a Tupperware rip-off that they slapped the word "baby" in the description of so they could charge more.
customer_reviews.author: Zach G.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the middle of the night feedings (you can easily pour powder formula into a bottle with water and shake up) or for travel or daycare! So glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Pic is green and blue, recieved pink and blue....yes I know you get what you get...make sure you lock the top in place with the little grooves so formula won't fall into the other compartments. This is economical and meets needs.
customer_reviews.author: Keep it Real

customer_reviews.title: Color was wrong but product is still good.
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the picture shows blue/green and I received pink/ blue. An additional container was in the package as well the size of one compartment. That was pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Leah P.

customer_reviews.title: A must for travel
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Easy to clean. I struggle to take the lid off to fill/clean the compartments, but it's a snug fit for a reason. Highly recommend when you are on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this for it's intended purpose. I use the multiple dispenser for nuts and granola, each compartment holds 1/4 cup of nuts. The smaller one I use for my protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Preston

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I needed a second one. I love that this comes with a single container. I usually use when I leave for just an hr or 2 and still need a bottle for the just in case instances. Packs easily in my shoulder bag
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.text: First the lid popped off in my bag and split precious formula power everywhere. Then it melted in dishwasher and lost shape. Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Don r.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended. Low quality.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not my first formula dispenser so I know what to expect... hard to open, stopper does nothing to stop lid’s twist between portions so you have to manually stop it, and to top it off closer on top keeps falling off... very disappointing quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Meytav Blum

customer_reviews.title: ... different brands and hands down this one is the best. Love the single to take to bed at ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased 3 different brands and hands down this one is the best. Love the single to take to bed at night so I don't have to stubble down to the kitchen to make a bottle. The large holds 3 servings, simple no fuss design and the formula all comes out on first try. The other brands I had to tap and move around to get the remaining formula out.
customer_reviews.author: tiffersben

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool little container
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time in my diaper bag. Easy to fill. Easy to use and clean. Only complaint is top is a bit hard to take off when trying to fill the entire container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍Traveling with formula
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we have a trip coming up and wanted an easier way to carry formula. So far seems good! I will update after our trip
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: Make sure its aligned correctly when pouring so formula doesn't come out from 2 areas..
customer_reviews.text: This item helps a lot for traveling. Just make sure the top is aligned correctly in the segment your using when you're pouring it into a bottle.. if not it could defeat the whole purpose of measuring the powder and you might need to make a whole new bottle. Overall, its good..
customer_reviews.author: Day

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag product
customer_reviews.text: These containers have been a lifesaver for stocking our diaper bag. If the lid for the bigger of the two isn’t lined up “just right” you can end up with a powdery mess but once I figured this out, I didn’t have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Emily See

customer_reviews.title: Odd colors
customer_reviews.text: Useful little container but what’s up with the colors? Another design flaw is switching between the second and third container has a click that sounds like the plastic is breaking. But for the price, it’s decent
customer_reviews.author: Mr Josh

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: We bought this one because it has the added 1 serving container. It's worked for us so far. We fill up the 3 serving container every night and take upstairs so we don't have to come back downstairs in the middle of the night. It's relatively easy to spill the formula when putting it into the container as the divided sections aren't that big. You do have to take your time with it to make sure you get all the formula tapped out of it and in to the bottle. As long as you make sure the lid is on good, you shouldn't have problems with the formula from one section shaking into the other sections.
customer_reviews.author: WVU06

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies on the go.
customer_reviews.text: This formula dispenser combo pack is perfect for traveling with baby. Each compartment fits 4 scoops of formula (typically good enough for a 8oz mix). Easy to clean. Dishwasher safe (top rack only). Nice to have a 3-compartment size for long days out and a single serving size for running quick errands with the baby. Note that the 3-compartment size container can have formula move from one compartment to the other when dispensing formula at an angle due to the walls not being full height to the lid. Best bet is to pour straight vertical. Other than that, this has been perfect for my family's needs.
customer_reviews.author: Teej

customer_reviews.title: Powder leaks out
customer_reviews.text: Super nice but powder leaks into other compartments, they also chose the color for me and gave me purple and pink which i have a boy that’s not a huge deal. The single dose one i love as my son eats once during the night so it’s easy to just roll over and poor it in the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful formula dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful formula dispenser. Especially for my Playtex drop-in liner bottles. The small dispenser is perfect for keeping in the diaper bag. I prefer this over the other formula dispensers because of the large opening. Dumps powder formula into the bottle easily with no mess and no waste. Great price and better than all other dispensers.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Pak

customer_reviews.title: Milk Mate Storage Containers Better
customer_reviews.text: I see some reviews complaining of the "shake shake shake" to get the contents out and mixing of contents, so I then started to look around my house for things I could use to portion my son's formula/cereal, then it hit me! I tried mycontainers and I love them! Large enough opening to easily get the milk/cereal in and out of the container. The twist lids made contents very secure for both liquid and dry. These containers can be opened one handed since they are small enough in diameter. Obviously not recommended for snacks but there are other storage containers to work well for that.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Not just for babies!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to dispense protein powder at the gym. Works great and holds 3 days worth of powder and the little extra “emergency” dispenser is a nice addition to keep as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Stechschulte

customer_reviews.title: Convenient little containers
customer_reviews.text: We had spent the first four months of our baby's life packing formula in ziploc bags, causing a massive headache when dispensing and preventing packing of the formula. This product has simply made transporting formula so simple, we're beating ourselves over why we didn't purchase it earlier. The only tough thing about this product is that it is hard to clean the small corners inside the bigger container. Using a dishwasher would probably make it easier. Apparently the center dividers were removable in an earlier version of the container but I prefer the stationary one as it prevents formula from slipping into another slot and potentially packing.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Lee

customer_reviews.title: So simple and helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver for parents using formula. We had carried around a Tupperware of formula and a scoop and made a mess every time. This makes it so easy to make a bottle on the go
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Keep Powder Equal in Each Compartment
customer_reviews.text: The small container works just fine when only bringing one serving worth of formula, however the multiple section dispenser did not keep the formula separate as it should because the lid would not fasten on tightly. I had two of the sections filled and by the time I went to make a bottle a lot of the powder was spilled into the third compartment therefore not keeping the right amount of formula in each section. In the end, I bought a different dispenser that was made by Munchkin as well, but works much better!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Wegs

customer_reviews.title: So much cheaper than packets!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect-easy to fill, top stays on well, easy to dispense powder and dishwasher safe! Why spend 5x more on packets of formula?
customer_reviews.author: gaelhusk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. It easy to change from one compartment to the other. Holds about 3-4 scoops of milk per compartment. The only issue is trying to get the thing open to put the milk open is kinda a tuff. But it’s very convenient for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Found a better verison
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved this dispenser! But after a few weeks the turn module on it was so lose it was slide into the other slot so the formula amount would vary and such.
customer_reviews.author: LyVea Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Compartments Mix Together
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was going to be great but the lid doesn’t close the compartments off from one another so if this thing gets jostled around in the diaper bag, the formula compartments mix together and become unevenly measured. It’s fine if you make sure not to move the container around but kinda defeats the purpose for when your on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Torrico

customer_reviews.title: Saves sooo much time, pretty colors too!
customer_reviews.text: These have been a lifesaver for the night when I'm too tired to function and just want to quickly make my baby's bottle without having to measure out formula each time..the smaller one is perfect for travel as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ankita Heath

customer_reviews.title: Top won’t close
customer_reviews.text: The top wouldn’t close so I couldn’t use it. You get what you pay for. I ended up buying the dr browns dispenser. So much better.
customer_reviews.author: miantonio

customer_reviews.title: These are good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are good for the price. The main con is that the 3 holder one has space between the lid and 3 compartments.. Meaning the compartments allow powder to shift to another section if one the side or upside down. Since I do not make 8 ounces bottles at a time mine is only half full in each compartment so maybe it would not happen if you put 4 scoops in each. Also if you leave it upright it is fine but I am pretty organized and this is not always that way that it ends up in the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amber P

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Gosh, I love these! The mystery of what colors you are going to receive is pretty exciting too! I got the blue containers with pink tops. I love how little space they take up in the diaper bag! It it much more convenient than lugging around the whole can of formula around all day. I have had other brands of formula dispensers but this is the only one that little sprinkles of formula came out of. The bottom of my diaper bag isn't covered in powder, YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: So glad we bought these
customer_reviews.text: These dispensers save my wife and I a lot of trouble when we're travelling. Imagine scooping formula into a bottle on an airplane. So glad we bought these. The larger dispenser can store 3, 8oz bottles worth of formula. Between the two, our nine-month-old is covered for an entire day of travel. These dispensers also wash easily. Opening them can take some effort, but that's the price you pay to ensure formula isn't spilled during transit.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Mislead on colors
customer_reviews.text: Under the impression I would receive a Green and Blue dispenser. Received a purple and pink dispenser. Forced to keep because i needed the dispenser ASAP so i could not send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Very good!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!! I bought this to take my collagen powder for my coffee to work and works wonderful! Perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Jamal P

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what you need, it is affordable. Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it says it is. We really like this one because of how easily the lid rotated on the canister to ensure that we dont make a mess with formula powder in the car or in public. As a father and mother of a baby, we get more than enough stains on our clothes courtesy of the children that I do not feel like I need to also wear formula powder around as well. This is a good and simple setup. It is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Alex H.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me organized
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I bought 2 for a trip. Love that I could prepackaged and have her formula ready for the day, all I had to worry about was pouring the water! Really digging this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rawrlll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for portion feeding!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't go without one of these if you're packing formula for children. I even use it just to store formula in the next room for middle-of-the-night feedings. It saves a lot of scooping aggravation at 3am! It's also helpful for sitters to just dump from a compartment and fill the bottle up. If you're still scooping and measuring when it's time to feed, please consider one of these dispensers!
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Word
customer_reviews.text: I toss in dishwasher to clean, no issues so far. Its handy to have formula measured out when baby is crying.the single one is nice to toss into diaper bag for a short trip.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome formula dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I love this for travelling around without an ice pack! Just pack with formula and fill bottles with water. You have to line up the notch with the divider, otherwise the formula spills over into the next spot. I keep having to remind my husband to do this, but sometimes he is in such a rush, he forgets and I cant be sure of the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading reviews on Amazon, and I totally love it. Very easy to clean. Powder dispenses very easily from it. And quite compact and easy to use. Takes up hardly any space in my diaper bag. You just need to make sure you do empty put the compartment completely - you don't want any formula left behind. We use it every day, day and night. I use it mostly at home - I always put the proper amount of formula in it first thing in the mornings... this way, I am not struggling with scoops and the formula box when my baby gets hungry!
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like to go out for awhile
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Super great for when you’re on the go! Wish it was a little easier to get all the formula out but it’s still a great life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Diabla

customer_reviews.title: lid defective
customer_reviews.text: Lid doesn't stay shut. Formula dumped all over my bag. What a waste of expensive Formula.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Each compartment can hold 8 oz of formula. I love this product because the large lid and the little flip lid are both very tight and secure. The formula of each section don't mix with one another. For each day, I feed my baby 5 times a day. This package only holds 4 feedings. So, I need to an old small tupperware cup with lid to hold the fifth feeding. In order to avoid spilling the formula on the 5th feeding, I use the tapered lid to help me funnel the powder into the bottle. This product would get 5 stars if there were 5 compartments. Otherwise, this product is nearly perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BeGreen

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay..
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and convenience! But you had to be careful when pouring the formula out because some formula from the other compartments would try to come out too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Page

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really needed this and was super happy when i received it! But I am ver disappointed because the lead does not close!
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Y.

product_meta.title: Munchkin Formula Dispenser Combo Pack, Colors May Vary
product_meta.description:
Color:Colors May VaryThe convenient combo pack comes with 1 single serve dispenser and 3 serving dispenser with rotating lid. Both have snap tight lids and easy pour spouts for fast and mess free preparation. So fill them up, stow them away and you're ready to go. Each compartment in this holds an 8 ounce single serving. This contains lid snaps on and off for easy filling and cleaning.

BRAND STORY
By

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The convenient combo pack comes with 1 - single-serve dispenser and 3-serving dispenser with rotating lid. Both have snap tight lids and easy-pour spouts for fast and mess-free preparation. So fill them up, stow them away and you're ready to go. Each compartment in this holds an 8 ounce single serving. This contains lid snaps on and off for easy filling and cleaning.

See more
feature_bullets: Ideal for use with all bottle and/or formula brands
Single serve holds 8 ounce ideal for quick outings
Each chamber of 3 section dispenser holds 8 ounce ideal for home or daycare
Ideal for travel; Colors may vary, you may receive in one of the following colors: Blue or pink
